wikipedia_page.main: Beatrice Ethel Lithiby (4 December 1889- 25 July 1966) was a British artist known as a painter and designer of stained glass and church furnishings. She served in both World War I and World War II in the British Army and in the former conflict also worked as a war artist for the Imperial War Museum.
